Signer Name.description: This is the name of the person who signed the confirmation or the name of the borrower. There maybe multiple signer or co-signers for each confirmation, in which case extract their information separately.

Email.description: This is the email of each signer

Phone Number.description: This is the phone number of each signer

Is the signer a foreign national?.description: Is the signer of this closing confirmation a foreign national

Appointment Address.description: This is the address where the closing confirmation was signed

Appointment Date and Time.description: The date on which the closing confirmation was signed

File Number.description: Any file numbers associated with the closing confirmation

Order on behalf of.description: The name of the person on whose behalf this closing confirmation is being signed

Company Fee.description: This is the fee charged by the loan company in dollars

Agent.description: The name of the agent or vendor responsible for the closing confirmation

Agent Fee.description: The fee charged by the agent in dollars

Witness Number.description: The number of witnesses for the signing of this closing confirmation

Upload Files.description: If any files were uploaded as part of this closing confirmation

Internal Notes.description: Any internal notes or instructions present in this closing confirmation, these maybe present as comments, but the instructions will be directed at the vendor/agent and not intended for the signer/borrower.

External notes.description: any external notes or instructions added to this closing confirmation, these maybe present as comments, but the notes will be directed at the borrower or signer.

Instruction type.description: the type of instructions added to this closing confirmation

Scan Backs Needed.description: whether any scan backs are needed for this closing confirmaiton
